content: hi in my usecase to do anything useful with basically any programming language I need to be able to plot at least simple charts. Plot animations would be another step. Are there any of such capabilities in roc. I think I asked this question once but I do not recall a response
Hi @Artur Swiderski, someone made a roc platform for drawing plots a while ago but it will likely need some updating to work with the latest version of roc
